selected_quotes: Nature Climate Change: New study - global warming will increase #coral diseases
By 2020, #climate change will make most of the world's corals vulnerable to disease.
#Coral mortality assoc. w/ ocean warming, disease by 2030 2040 B.Willis discusses @NatureClimate paper at #coral15 ht…
Projections of climate conditions that increase coral disease susceptibility #climate #climatechange
Increased coral disease with warming may be even greater driver of coral reef decline than coral bleaching.

news.title: New climate projections paint bleak future for tropical coral reefs
